question:
If \(0 < a < \frac{1}{b}< 1\), then which of the following must be true?
(A) \(a^2 > a > b > b^2\)
(B) \(b > a > a^2 > b^2\)
(C) \(b^2 > a > a^2 > b\)
(D) \(b^2 > a^2 > b > a\)
(E) \(b^2 > b > a > a^2\)
